title: Texas King
description: Eli Christopher is the stepchild that his stepfamily never wanted, and they do nothing to hide that fact. After years of abuse, Eli is beginning to believe them. Maybe he’s not worth much after all. But everything changes when the King of Texas tracks him down, determined to make him realize his own worth. Aiden Bacon is the media-proclaimed King of Texas, a title given to him after his father’s passing and his not-so-modest inheritance of a billion-dollar company. Aiden’s only goal in life is keep his company afloat and keep his own demons at bay. But his whole world turns upside down when a tiny, shy delivery boy brings a pizza to his home and then disappears, leaving Aiden infatuated and desperate to track him down.Texas King is a loose m/m retelling of the Cinderella fairytale and contains bullying triggers and familial abuse.
author: A.R.  King
